data.text: Look, there's treasure near the river!
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed: <story>Look, there's treasure near the river!

data.text:
Treasure?! Wait... I've been had! 
During my training, even... Geez!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Treasure?! Wait... I've been had! 
<story>During my training, even... Geez!

data.text:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry! Heh... Tap, you look happy recently, 
and you're so focused on racing. ...Before long, you 
won't be coming here anymore, right?
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry, I'm sorry! Heh... Tap, you look happy recently, 
<story>and you're so focused on racing. ...Before long, you 
<story>won't be coming here anymore, right?

data.text:
You, and the rest of us... We'll be seeing each other 
a lot less... I guess we'll talk over LANE.
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>You, and the rest of us... We'll be seeing each other 
<story>a lot less... I guess we'll talk over LANE.

data.text:
Hahaha, what are you saying?! 
We'll have fun together until the end of time!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Hahaha, what are you saying?! 
<story>We'll have fun together until the end of time!

data.text:
Haha, you exaggerate. 
Do you really think that's gonna happen?
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>Haha, you exaggerate. 
<story>Do you really think that's gonna happen?

data.text:
Whether the world turns to ruins or not... 
Eventually we'll all graduate from school.
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>Whether the world turns to ruins or not... 
<story>Eventually we'll all graduate from school.

data.text:
I'm looking over documents that I gathered while 
researching Tap Dance City's runner strategy.

choices.text: But Katsuragi Ace's "great escape..."

data.processed:
<story>I'm looking over documents that I gathered while 
<story>researching Tap Dance City's runner strategy.

data.text:
One of the most legendary runners has to be 
Silence Suzuka. Her spectacular record at the 
Kinko Sho still stands to this day.

choices.text: To be even better than that...

data.processed:
<story>One of the most legendary runners has to be 
<story>Silence Suzuka. Her spectacular record at the 
<story>Kinko Sho still stands to this day.

data.text: And I'm going to bring them to fruition! How about it?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>And I'm going to bring them to fruition! How about it?

data.text:
I shake my head. At that moment, I just couldn't refuse. 
Now I'm here collecting data to make a plan for her.

choices.text: I'm still feeling out our bond.
I'm still feeling out our bond.

data.processed:
<story>I shake my head. At that moment, I just couldn't refuse. 
<story>Now I'm here collecting data to make a plan for her.

data.text: Yeah! The day has come! A race of me versus all of you!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Yeah! The day has come! A race of me versus all of you!

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Tap's Friends
data.processed: <story>Yeah!

data.text: Yo, Trainer! What's your plan to steer my path?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Let's see...

data.processed: <story>Yo, Trainer! What's your plan to steer my path?

data.text:
From what I gathered, none of them are assertive 
enough to run far ahead. It's looking like the race 
will develop at a slow pace.

choices.text: Don't give them a chance to catch their breath.
choices.processed: <size=35>Don't give them a chance to catch their breath.</size>

data.processed:
<story>From what I gathered, none of them are assertive 
<story>enough to run far ahead. It's looking like the race 
<story>will develop at a slow pace.

data.text:
Okay... 12.4 seconds per furlong... 
You've brought out your usual level of detail, eh?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Okay... 12.4 seconds per furlong... 
<story>You've brought out your usual level of detail, eh?

data.text:
And I have to destroy the others through my stamina? You 
think I've got the strength, let alone brains to timekeep?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: I do. That's why I made this plan.
I do. That's why I made this plan.

data.processed:
<story>And I have to destroy the others through my stamina? You 
<story>think I've got the strength, let alone brains to timekeep?

data.text: Great! I'm glad I ran so much for you. I'll be sailing to my heart's content, over the waves you laid out for me!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Great! I'm glad I ran so much for you. I'll be sailing to my heart's content, over the waves you laid out for me!

data.text: Thus, the race begins...
data.processed: <story>Thus, the race begins...

data.text:
Ugh! I can't...! 
This speed...!
data.name: Horsegirl with sunglasses
data.processed:
<story>Ugh! I can't...! 
<story>This speed...!

data.text:
The success of this plan was a big gamble. 
Using speed to create a gap early on...

choices.text: (I can't believe she's making it work...!)
choices.processed: <size=42>(I can't believe she's making it work...!)</size>

choices.text: (I can't believe she's making it work...!)
choices.processed: <size=42>(I can't believe she's making it work...!)</size>

data.processed:
<story>The success of this plan was a big gamble. 
<story>Using speed to create a gap early on...

data.text: Haaa!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Our forces, joined together...
Our forces, joined together...

data.processed: <story>Haaa!

data.text:
Seeing her accelerate even more on the final stretch, 
it's like a dream come true. I'm starting to feel like she'd 
be able to make any future plans come true as well.
data.processed:
<story>Seeing her accelerate even more on the final stretch, 
<story>it's like a dream come true. I'm starting to feel like she'd 
<story>be able to make any future plans come true as well.

data.text:
I'm astonished by Tap Dance City's excellent display of 
the runner strategy,
data.processed:
<story>I'm astonished by Tap Dance City's excellent display of 
<story>the runner strategy,

data.text:
I'm sure that she'll be able to surpass 
the runners of the past!

choices.text: (I will make her the strongest leader!)
(I will make her the strongest leader!)

data.processed:
<story>I'm sure that she'll be able to surpass 
<story>the runners of the past!

data.text:
*huff* *huff* Whadda ya think, Trainer? 
Will I be able to be "the world's greatest horsegirl?"
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Yes, I'm sure of it now.
Yes, I'm sure of it now.

data.processed:
<story>*huff* *huff* Whadda ya think, Trainer? 
<story>Will I be able to be "the world's greatest horsegirl?"

data.text:
Bye-bye, Tap! 
That was a lot of fun!
data.name: Girl with pigtails

choices.text: Ah? Isn't she your friend?
Ah? Isn't she your friend?

data.processed:
<story>Bye-bye, Tap! 
<story>That was a lot of fun!

data.text: "Bye-bye"...? ...Sorry, Trainer! Hey, hold on!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: "Bye-bye"...? ...Sorry, Trainer! Hey, hold on!

data.text:
Huh? Tap? ...And your trainer, too? 
Why'd you follow me?
data.name: Girl with pigtails

choices.text: *huff* That's what I'd like to...

data.processed:
<story>Huh? Tap? ...And your trainer, too? 
<story>Why'd you follow me?

data.text:
You just left all of a sudden. 
Hey, you've been acting a bit weird for some time...
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>You just left all of a sudden. 
<story>Hey, you've been acting a bit weird for some time...

data.text:
...... We... We can't be together forever 
I thought it was time to say goodbye.
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>...... We... We can't be together forever 
<story>I thought it was time to say goodbye.

data.text:
You see... I got a C on the mock exam for the university 
I want to go to... So my mom arranged for me to go 
to cram school starting tomorrow.
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>You see... I got a C on the mock exam for the university 
<story>I want to go to... So my mom arranged for me to go 
<story>to cram school starting tomorrow.

data.text:
...And? It's not like you won't have any free time. 
And what about after the exams are over?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>...And? It's not like you won't have any free time. 
<story>And what about after the exams are over?

data.text:
Tap... It's not like we'll be kids forever. You should be 
a bit more realistic, or you'll never grow up.
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>Tap... It's not like we'll be kids forever. You should be 
<story>a bit more realistic, or you'll never grow up.

data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: ("More realistic...")

data.processed: <story>...!

data.text:
You should act a bit more realistic. You're an adult. 
What you're going for is like a child's dream.
data.name: Veteran Trainer A

choices.text: (...It comes up again.)

data.processed:
<story>You should act a bit more realistic. You're an adult. 
<story>What you're going for is like a child's dream.

data.text:
Haha! I see... More realistic... More realistic! Yeah, 
of course! Realistically, us breaking up is inevitable!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Hold on, Tap...

data.processed:
<story>Haha! I see... More realistic... More realistic! Yeah, 
<story>of course! Realistically, us breaking up is inevitable!

data.text:
Farewells happen at many turning points in life. 
Graduating, getting employed, moving, arguments...

choices.text: (Real life is cruel like that...)

data.processed:
<story>Farewells happen at many turning points in life. 
<story>Graduating, getting employed, moving, arguments...

data.text:
Pu-hah! Hahaha! I get it, I get it. 
So... How about we continue "realistically."
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Pu-hah! Hahaha! I get it, I get it. 
<story>So... How about we continue "realistically."

data.text: Huh?
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed: <story>Huh?

data.text:
Think about it. All our paths are starting to diverge. All 
we need is a means, a place and a time to meet up again!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Think about it. All our paths are starting to diverge. All 
<story>we need is a means, a place and a time to meet up again!

data.text:
All we need is the power of money, and our paths 
will meet again! ...Am I wrong?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>All we need is the power of money, and our paths 
<story>will meet again! ...Am I wrong?

data.text:
Of course, you don't need to worry about the money! 
I'm gonna build the most amazing castle for us all!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Of course, you don't need to worry about the money! 
<story>I'm gonna build the most amazing castle for us all!

data.text:
All I need now is a ship. 
Hey, Trainer!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>All I need now is a ship. 
<story>Hey, Trainer!

data.text:
Let me ask you again. 
Will I be able to be "the world's greatest horsegirl?"
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Let me ask you again. 
<story>Will I be able to be "the world's greatest horsegirl?"
